divs: sighting detailswe were sitting on the balcony talking an then out of the corner of our eyes we saw a glowing orange\yellow flaming circular object peaking through the clouds in the eastern sky, at first thinking it was the moon but then realizing that it is 12:08am an the moon is not normally in that position for us, we turned an looked an saw the outline of the moon behind clouds where it is normally. we then refocused on the object still peaking through the clouds showing 1\2 to 2\3 rds of what looked like a burning planet an as we were watching and trying to figure out what it was, the object got brighter and then slowly started fading away and then it disappeared with the clouds covering it and then a couple minutes later a glow coming from behind the clouds in the same area and then it just faded away. its now 1:07am an have been out here watching the area and still nothing else has appeared since then.
Summary: looked like half a burning planet
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Oshawa
There were no other sightings in Oshawa on or around July 27th 2013
